Player History
Injured on 7/5/2002 with a Sore Elbow, out for one week...
Traded from San Diego to Milwaukee on 1/31/2005 (Going to SDN: P H. Bell. Going to MIL: 3B A. Ramirez, P C. Bootcheck, P L. Puñal)...
Earned first career win on 5/10/2005...
Had first career hit on 6/7/2005, off Steve Avery (ATL)...
Injured on 6/24/2007 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/4/2010 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 9 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 23rd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2012...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Colorado on 2/26/2012 (Going to COL: 1B S. Allie, 2B D. Travis, P C. Stratton. Going to PIT: P K. Gabbard)...
Injured on 5/25/2012 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/4/2014, off Andrew Albers (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/16/2014, off Shaun Marcum (CHW)...
Injured on 8/1/2014 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/14/2018 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/21/2018 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Anaheim on 2/26/2020 to a 4-year deal worth $5,500,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Drafted in 7th round, 127th overall pick, by Detroit in 1978...
